text: Athar Fi al-Rimal (, Traces in the Sand) is a 1954 Egyptian drama film directed by Gamal Madkoor. It starred Imad Hamdi and Faten Hamama. Faten Hamama plays Ragia, a woman who helps Ibrahim (Imad Hamdi) retain his memory and tell the story of his sister's death. == References == Category:1954 films Category:Arabic-language films Category:1954 drama films Category:Egyptian films Category:Egyptian drama films
title: Traces in the Sand
